extendedInfo.description: Wake up to a new Hot Stud every morning.Hot Studs Daily Wallpaper downloads a new stud every night, so you have a hot new wallpaper every morning!Keywords: gay wallpaper, hot guys wallpaper, hot men wallpaper, hot dudesINSTRUCTIONS:Once you've downloaded this live wallpaper it's important to note that it will not appear on your homescreen as an icon. To activate it, tap on the 'Menu' button, select 'Wallpapers' and on the popup box select 'Live Wallpapers'. From there scroll down to the name of the live wallpaper you just downloaded and enjoy!
